name: malformed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(used especially of part of the body) wrongly formed: There are genetic defects which can cause malformed teeth. The shells of the snails appeared to be malformed. See
malformation
More examplesFewer examplesThe brain imaging showed malformed blood vessels.Scientists have been studying malformed frogs along with the water and sediment in which they were found. It was discovered that the lamb had malformed arteries leading to its lungs.
